sentence: All students from [group] are just a bunch of entitled brats.
It's pathetic how some university students think they can just coast through school.
You should really drop out; you're wasting everyone's time with your laziness.
Stop pretending you're studying; you're just wasting space on campus.
People like you ruin the academic environment with your negativity.
Your attitude towards education is disgusting; you don't deserve to be here.
How can you even call yourself a student with grades like that?
You're just a dumbass who thinks they know everything about the world.
This university is filled with idiots who can't even pass a simple exam.
I can't believe you think you're going to pass with that attitude.
Your constant whining about assignments is so annoying; just do them.
No one cares about your excuses; just put in the effort already.
It's sad to see how you always blame the professors for your failures.
You should be ashamed of how you treat your classmates.
You're just a toxic presence in this university, and nobody likes you.
I can't believe you still have friends with that pathetic attitude.
Stop hiding behind your excuses to fail; just own your mistakes.
Your hate-filled comments are why this university is suffering.
You're not a victim; you're just a lazy student who won't try.
You have no idea how damaging your words can be to others on this campus.
Your profile is just a bunch of red flags; itâ€™s fucking embarrassing.
